name: Caged Bird
text: When Revealed: Find Red Guardian's Shield and tuck it under here. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Alexei Shostakov → remove this card from the game.

name: Captain America
text: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After Captain America attacks and damages you, discard 1 random card from your hand. (Red Guardians's nemesis minion.) "Step outside quietly...or there is going to be trouble!"

name: Envied Idol
text: "If I am to accomplish my purpose… by destroying Captain America… I must surpass him in every way!" —Red Guardian The Red Guardian player cannot change to alter-ego form. When Revealed: The Red Guardian player changes to hero form. [hazard]

name: "I Can't Do It All Day"
text: When Revealed: Choose to either exhaust your identity or discard 1 random card from your hand. "What kind of super serum did you get?" —Red Guardian

name: "I Don't Want You"
text: When Revealed: Choose to either spend a [physical] resource or discard 1 random card from your hand. "Red Guardian was loyal to a fault." —Red Guardian

name: Symbol of Failure
text: When Revealed: Choose to either discard a card you control or a discard 1 random card from your hand. "Who would suspect this symbol…their falsehood…of failure?" —Red Guardian
